divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the kitchen and i looked out my blinds and saw a triangle it hoovered there then it shot off them reaper in the sky i noticed that it wold leave after a air craft i believe was us air force. soon enough i noticed that the plane was chastening it. then i saw it make a turn form strait to side ways almost over my pleas. as you can tell i was shocked and fascinated. the way i lost sight of the object is it went form strait to up strait in sec.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
